Data messages

data:messages.adsGoHere

Gadget type: Global

Usage

<data:messages.adsGoHere/>

<b:eval expr='data:messages.adsGoHere'/>

<b:message name='messages.adsGoHere'/>

Values

LanguageValue
EnglishAds go here
FrenchLes annonces apparaissent ici
IndonesianIklan ada di sini
PortugueseOs anúncios são apresentados aqui
SpanishAquí van los anuncios
VietnameseQuảng cáo hiển thị ở đây

data:messages.archive

Gadget type: Global

Usage

<data:messages.archive/>

<b:eval expr='data:messages.archive'/>

<b:message name='messages.archive'/>

Values

LanguageValue
EnglishArchive
FrenchArchiver
IndonesianArsip
PortugueseArquivar
SpanishArchivo
VietnameseLưu trữ

data:messages.at

Gadget type: Global

Usage

<data:messages.at/>

<b:eval expr='data:messages.at'/>

<b:message name='messages.at'/>

Values

LanguageValue
Englishat
Frenchà
Indonesianpukul
Portugueseà(s)
Spanisha las
Vietnameselúc
